price: Wͻn a wͻdi nsεmmͻne wͻ asaase no soͻ na wͻntoto ntotoeε pa no “.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
